subject: Web3
title: Real-World Asset NFTs
description: A short lesson to help you apply Real-World Asset NFTs.

hook.text: What if your house deed, car title, or diploma were NFTs? Physical ownership on a digital ledger.

buildup.text: Several countries are experimenting with blockchain-based property registries to reduce fraud and paperwork.

discovery.text: In Georgia (the country), over one million land titles were registered on a blockchain by 2020.

twist.text: Legal systems aren't ready. If a blockchain says you own a house but a court disagrees, the court wins.

climax.text: Real-world asset NFTs need legal frameworks to match. The technology works; the law hasn't caught up.

punchline.text: Your house deed could be an NFT. The law just isn't ready.

quiz.question: What is the main barrier to real-world asset NFTs?
options: Legal systems haven't adapted to recognize them
